thread.title: Snoop Dogg, Jermaine Dupri to star in new BET reality series
thread.title_full: Snoop Dogg, Jermaine Dupri to star in new BET reality series - US News

author: USNews
title: Snoop Dogg, Jermaine Dupri to star in new BET reality series
text:
Snoop Dogg, Jermaine Dupri, Birdman, Damon Dash to star in BET hip-hop reality show Associated Press Oct. 9, 2015 | 4:37 p.m. EDT + More NEW YORK (AP) â€” Rappers Snoop Dogg and Birdman, Grammy-winning producer Jermaine Dupri, and entrepreneur Damon Dash are among the stars of a still-untitled BET reality series, the network announced Friday.
The show, which is set to start shooting in November for release in late 2016, will film in Los Angeles and go inside their lives and their companies over eight episodes, investigating how they balance the professional and the personal at the top of the hip-hop world.
Lemuel Plummer, whose credits include "Preachers of Atlanta" and "Preachers of L.A.," is the executive producer for the show.
Snoop had a short-lived reality series on E! called "Snoop Dogg's Father Hood" in 2007-2008.
